entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • BindingContext Not Propagated Correctly to ContentView When ControlTemplate Changes at Runtime #25934
  • DisplayPromptAsync does not accept Enter Key Press from scanner data read #25932
  • Preferences DateTime Storage Issues #25930
  • Unpackaged windows build does not include font resources #25929
  • There is a rogue FluentUI.cs in Resources/Fonts #25928
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Investigate if we can improve the error handling experience for .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid apps #25927
    Backlog
  • [Android] External keyboard moves focus with Enter between entries #25926
    Backlog
  • [WINDOWS] Setting BackgroundColor for Slider updates the Maximum Track Color #25921
    Backlog
  • .NET MAUI set AppShell custom FlyoutIcon displayed problem #25920
  • [Windows] - Top Tab Visibility Changes Not Reflected Until Tab Switch #25913
    Backlog
  • [9.0] [iOS] [Regression] - ToolbarItem color when used with IconImageSource is always white. #25912
    .NET 9 SR2

Closed

  • MAUI ios application build fails with clang error code 137 #25607
  • Visual Studio 17.12 and .NET 8 requires XCode 16 #25888
  • Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Shapes.RoundRectangle has been Garbage Collected #25716
  • .Net 8/ 9 Memory leaks #25425
    Backlog
  • App crashes when navigating from TabbedPage to another TabbedPage #22131
    Backlog
  • [Windows]Repeated navigation page crash #18441
    Backlog
  • VS upgrade to 17.12 fails to recognize iOS simulators from XCode 16.1 #25904
  • Flyout Menu Icon Changes to 'Back' Icon When Flyout Appears #25809
  • .NET MAUI BLAZOR v.8 unable connect to the api with the http url #25901
  • MAUI Blazor in .NET 9 does not run on Android API level 31 and below #25862
  • Span with tail truncation and paragraph breaks with Java.Lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException #25836
    Backlog
  • [BUG] Memory Leak using SkiaBitmapExportContext #25881
  • App will not install on device with Sign in with Apple capability in the provisioning profile and com.apple.developer.applesignin key is in Entitlements.plist after publishing. #25923
  • Page.IsBusy activity idicators gets stuck/causes multiple to be displayed #23674
    Backlog
  • AccurracyBestForNavigation is misspelled #25844
  • "ObjectDisposedException" When Toggling Header/Footer in CollectionView Dynamically #25724
    Backlog
  • OnNavigatingFrom called even if not navigating back on swipe in IOS #25699
  • Can't install on device w/ 9.0.100 but 9.0.0-rc.2 works #25860
  • XAML loader fails after new element added in project #25705
  • Changing visibility in child elements does not work #25154

PullRequests

Created

  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241118221232126 to main #25933
    area-infrastructure
  • Upgrade Syncfusion Toolkit version from 1.0.1 to 1.0.2 #25925
    area-infrastructure, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Fixed CarouselView Loop="False" rendering items incorrectly - test fix #25924
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed [iOS] Fix CarouselViewRemoveAt so that it's passing on both CV1 and CV2 sets of handlers #25919
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 12 #25917
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [ci] Bump branding for sr2 #25915
    area-infrastructure
  • [Testing] Changes in randomly failing UITests #25914
    area-testing

Merged

  • [Android] Span with tail truncation and paragraph breaks with Java.Lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - fix #25892
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • Fixed CarouselView Loop="False" rendering items incorrectly #25545
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Revert "Fixed CarouselView Loop="False" rendering items incorrectly" #25922
  • [Android] Page.IsBusy activity indicators gets stuck/causes multiple to be displayed #23745
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation
  • Differentiate app icon & splash screen colors for sample content template #25839
    area-templates
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 10 #25847
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Toggling Header/Footer in CollectionView Dynamically throws an exception #25743
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Add Syncfusion announcement blog post to news in README #25840
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Housekeeping] Moved a UI test to the proper place #25877
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Try run template tests on arm64 #25895

Updated

  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Build maui.aar with the new AndroidGradleProject item #25632
    area-infrastructure
  • Disable `MeasureInvalidated` propagation by default / clean-up legacy layouts / fix iOS CV items resize #25664
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Update Windows SDK projection for testing #25781
    area-infrastructure, community ✨
  • Revert to CollectionViewHandler and CarouselViewHandler for tests #25692
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • made FilterQuality configurable for Resizetizer #25686
    area-single-project, do-not-merge, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [Windows] Fix for setting IsClippedToBounds="True" inside a Border control will crash on Windows #25506
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-border, .NET 9 SR2
  • [Testing] More Appium actions #25886
    area-testing
  • [Testing] Implement PressEnter Appium action in Catalyst #25854
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Fix android image loading race condition and improve logging #25870
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 11 #25855
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 7 #25795
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix select-all Entry select logic #23329
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-entry
  • Fix Disabling some image tests after updating net9.0 with main #25770
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Relative source binding for gradient stop fix #20287
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR2
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨, area-controls-contextmenu, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [Windows] Fix crash when navigating pages #25740
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [Android] Input transparent for a content page #25104
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • CollectionView with EmptyView and EmptyViewTemplate for Data template selector throws an exception #25418
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment is off #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 9 #25815
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 5 #25772
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fix for issue 23316 Android AVIF support with Glide #25376
    platform/android 🤖, do-not-merge
  • BarBackground with Brush in NavigationPage on theme change #24429
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Testing] Enable snapshot tests on Catalyst #25710
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-testing
  • [android] Fallback to default icons in SearchHandler #25067
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [UITesting, Catalyst] Fixed DragAndDropUITests to be more reliable #25146
    area-testing, community ✨
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Fix for OnAppearing of Page called again, although this page was on already replaced NavigationStack #25596
    area-navigation, community ✨
  • Fix for Tabs does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix for ItemSpacing not properly applied between the item and group header in CollectionView Horizontal LinearItemsLayout #25882
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Ensure all controls in Layout with Search Bar are visible in Landscape Mode #24198
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [iOS]Fix for Character Spacing Not Updating Correctly in Editor for Dynamically Added Text #25347
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [net9.0][Enhancement][iOS] Add a done button to entry #24645
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • NavigationBarColors from NavigationPage not changing on AppTheme changing - fix #24766
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • [Android] Added a scroll bar for collection view #25471
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Character spacing in button - fix #25657
    community ✨, area-controls-button
  • SwipeItemView won't render FontImageSource on first opening - fix #25397
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview
  • Source Generation for XAML #24865
    area-xaml
  • [Windows] Fix FlyoutPage ShouldShowToolbarButton when overridden to return false, still shows button in title bar #25857
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨
  • [iOS] Gradient never returns to the correct color - fix #25910
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-border
  • Improve TextToSpeech function by adding a speech rate parameter #24798
    community ✨
  • Add support for iOS/Mac specific modals styled as popovers #23984
    community ✨, area-controls-modal
  • Fix 19647 #20127
    area-xaml, stale
  • [iOS] Fix for CollectionView with horizontal grid layout has extra space on right end #25825
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fixed iOS button flickering animation when layout updates #25662
    area-layout, area-controls-button
  • [Testing] Implement themes change in Appium actions on Windows #25863
    area-testing
  • Fixed the hide password hint which is showing when the entry is focused #25768
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Fixed the iOS BackButton title does not update when set to an empty string or whitespace #25813
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper, .NET 9 SR2
  • [iOS] ScrollView's Gradient Background fix #25541
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [blazorwebview] align `SupportedOSPlatform` attribute with templates #25073
    area-blazor
  • Fixed Shell Navigating event issue when switching tabs #25749
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Updating a Border.TranslationY does not work in Android - fix #25760
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-border
  • Fix Shell Flyout Menu Visibility Issue When Navigating Between TabBar and Flyout Items #25510
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • Fixed CollectionView SelectedItem binding issue on initial loading #25555
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR1.1
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
